prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Promptbook aims to enable a paradigm shift towards writing software in plain human language that both humans and machines can understand and execute. It leverages the power of large language models to transform human-computer interaction.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
